string.name: photopicker_preloading_dialog_title
string.translation_description: Dialog title that is shown to the user while cloud media files are being downloaded

string.name: photopicker_preloading_progress_message
string.translation_description: Dialog message showing the user the progress of the media download

string.name: photopicker_preloading_dialog_error_title
string.translation_description: A generic error dialog the user sees when there was an issue with loading their photos.

string.name: photopicker_preloading_dialog_error_message
string.translation_description: A generic error message letting the user know there was an issue loading their photos.

resources.string: Try again later. Your photos will be available once the issue is resolved.

string.name: photopicker_banner_cloud_media_available_title
string.translation_description: Banner title that tells users their backed up cloud media is available

string.name: photopicker_banner_cloud_media_available_message
string.translation_description: Banner message that tells user which account and application are providing cloud media to the photopicker

resources.string: You can select photos from %1$s account %2$s

string.name: photopicker_banner_cloud_choose_account_title
string.translation_description: Banner title that tells prompts the user to visit the cloud providers settings page and choose an account.

string.name: photopicker_banner_cloud_choose_account_message
string.translation_description: Banner message that tells users to visit the cloud providers account settings page to choose an account.

resources.string: To include photos from %1$s here, choose an account in the app

string.name: photopicker_banner_cloud_choose_account_button
string.translation_description: Button text that takes the user to the account settings page.

string.name: photopicker_banner_cloud_choose_provider_title
string.translation_description: Banner title that tells the user to select a cloud application to provide cloud media

string.name: photopicker_banner_cloud_choose_provider_message
string.translation_description: Banner message informing the user to select a cloud media app to see photos backed up in the cloud.

resources.string: To include backed up photos here, choose a cloud media app in Settings

string.name: photopicker_banner_cloud_choose_app_button
string.translation_description: Button label that takes the user to the cloud provider settings page to select an app.
